## Description

Show networks


## Usage

```r
showNetworks(...)
```


## Arguments

Argument      |Description
------------- |----------------
`...`     |      Arguments passed on to [`showGiottoSpatNetworks`](#showgiottospatnetworks)   list("\n", "    ", list(list(list("gobject")), list("a giotto object")), "\n", "    ", list(list(list("nrows")), list("number of rows to print")), "\n", "  ")
